assemblyInfo.assemblyMethod: FALCON v. 1.0.2; FALCON-Unzip v. 1.0.2; purge_haplotigs v. bitbucket 7.10.2018; scaff10x v. git 4.28.2018; Bionano Solve DLS v. 3.2.1; Salsa2 HiC v. 2.0; Arrow polishing and gap filling v. 5.1.0.26412; longranger align v. 2.2.2; freebayes v. 1.2.0; gEVAL manual curation v. 2019-10-25; VGP standard assembly pipeline v. 1.5; Additional Purge_dup and Polish v. 2020-05-28

bioprojects.title: Balaenoptera musculus (blue whale) genome, alternate haplotype, mBalMus1
Balaenoptera musculus (blue whale) genome assembly, mBalMus1

attributes.name: collected_by
attributes.value: Jeff K. Jacobsen, Susanne Meyer, Li-Fang Chu, Jessica Antosiewicz-Bourget

biosample.collectedBy: Jeff K. Jacobsen, Susanne Meyer, Li-Fang Chu, Jessica Antosiewicz-Bourget

description.comment: The data under this project are made available subject to the Genome10K data use policies (URL: https://genome10k.soe.ucsc.edu/data-use-policies). The Balaenoptera musculus is an important marine mammal species for various kinds of research. The sample was collected off the coast of Santa Barbara, CA by Jeff K. Jacobsen, Susanne Meyer, Li-Fang Chu, and Jessica Antosiewicz-Bourget. The samples were provided by Morgridge Institute for Research and used to produce a reference assembly as part of the G10K-VGP Project.
description.title: Animal sample from Balaenoptera musculus (blue whale)

sampleIds.label: Sample name
sampleIds.value: mBalMus1 Blue whale tissue for G10K-VGP reference genome

assemblyInfo.comments: This assembly represents the alternate haplotype of the diploid genome Balaenoptera musculus. The principal haplotype sequences are in WGS project VNFC00000000
assemblyInfo.sequencingTech: PacBio Sequel I; Illumina NovaSeq; 10X Genomics chromium; Dovetail Genomics HiC
